talents.desc: Reduces Black Soulstone's resurrection cost to 60 Souls.
talents.name: Devil's Due

talents.desc: Fire Stomp also surrounds you in flames that deal 10 (+2 per level) damage every second for 6 seconds.
talents.name: Fire Devil

talents.desc: Basic Attacks reduce Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.
talents.name: Battle Momentum

talents.desc: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 320 (+72 per level) damage over 4 seconds.  The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.
talents.name: Lightning Breath

talents.desc: Fire Stomp waves return to you, dealing 125% damage.
talents.name: Firestorm

talents.desc: Fire Stomp increases Diablo's Movement Speed by 20% and Basic Attack damage by 50% for 2 seconds.
talents.name: Rampage

talents.desc: Lightning Breath lasts and reaches 50% longer.
talents.name: Hellstorm

talents.desc: Periodically reduces the damage received from Hero Basic Attacks by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.
talents.name: Block

talents.desc: Fire Stomp also surrounds you in flames that deal 10 (+2 per level) damage every second for 6 seconds.
talents.name: Fire Devil

talents.desc: Increases the amount of Health gained from Black Soulstone by 66%.
talents.name: Soul Steal

talents.desc: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 100 (+10 per level) damage and stunning for 2 seconds.
talents.name: Apocalypse

talents.desc: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.
talents.name: Spell Shield

talents.desc: Overpower can store 2 charges.
talents.name: Continuous Overpower

talents.desc: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
